long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You're an adventurous explorer, running through ruined temples. Collecting gold to get cool outfits. Avoiding obstacles along the way, and get help from useful power-ups.


Enjoy Temple Run Gameplay Guide for free, with more exciting features to come!
